title: [插件问题] EssentialsX 使用 /help 无效
author: TheSuncommand
txt_content:
本帖最后由 TheSuncommand 于 2019-2-17 05:16 编辑 
Essentials在玩家进入游戏后报错
[05:00:44 WARN]: [Essentials] Plugin Essentials v2.0.1-b172 generated an exception while executing task 218 java.lang.NullPointerException at net.milkbowl.vault.permission.plugins.Permission_GroupManager.getPrimaryGroup(Permission_GroupManager.java:325) ~[?:?] at net.milkbowl.vault.permission.Permission.getPrimaryGroup(Permission.java:691) ~[?:?] at net.milkbowl.vault.permission.Permission.getPrimaryGroup(Permission.java:703) ~[?:?] at com.earth2me.essentials.perm.impl.AbstractVaultHandler.getGroup(AbstractVaultHandler.java:33) ~[?:?] at com.earth2me.essentials.perm.PermissionsHandler.getGroup(PermissionsHandler.java:26) ~[?:?] at com.earth2me.essentials.User.getGroup(User.java:528) ~[?:?] at com.earth2me.essentials.textreader.TextInput.(TextInput.java:28) ~[?:?] at com.earth2me.essentials.EssentialsPlayerListener.delayedJoin(EssentialsPlayerListener.java:195) ~[?:?] at com.earth2me.essentials.EssentialsPlayerListener$1.run(EssentialsPlayerListener.java:166) ~[?:?] at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:58) ~[PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] at com.destroystokyo.paper.ServerSchedulerReportingWrapper.run(ServerSchedulerReportingWrapper.java:22) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-1031.jar:git-Paper-1031] at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_181] at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_181] at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_181]
在输入指令:/help 之后显示下面的情况
错误:null
游戏核心:PaperSpigot 1.11.2
希望大佬帮忙解决这个问题
服务器插件列表:附带:除了/help并没有发现任何不能用的地方

replies.author: Enron233
replies.txt_content:
LZ 你这个权限组插件没全啊 正常应该是好多个的 建议去原贴重新下载

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-619883-1-1.html
